A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: DONT BELIEVE THE STAR WARS STANS. It was a great fucking movie. I like where the Star Wars franchise is headed. The writers have to break away to bring new storytelling to the forefront. For angry Stans: just because the story didn't go in the way you wanted doesn't make it a bad movie. It was exciting\, well-acted\, well-written\, self-aware\, and provided culturally relevant themes with layered nuances.
